title: Foods and fun: a nutrition adventure
creator_credit: Rick Reinert and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
brief_description: Animated film explaining the basics of good health: rest, exercise and a balanced diet. Stresses the need to start the day with a good breakfast. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Rick Reinert and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
